table_caption: Volumetric analysis of white matter (WM), gray matter (GM), and cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) volumes across groups. The data are presented as the means (standard deviation). Shapiro–Wilk tests indicate non-normal distributions, and Kruskal–Wallis tests reveal significant differences across groups for all brain compartments. * Three CN individuals and one EMCI individual were excluded from this analysis due to the unavailability of structural images. ** p < 0.001.
